title: Attempting to reconnect
body:
hi i am player on Na server and i have been having this issue where when i am in camp select or que time i have this message pop up attempting to recconect even though my internet works fine outside the league client. 

i have changed my internet router, i play on a hard wire connecting and this problem started yesterday, due to this problem i have got 20 minutes penalty for no reason whatsoever 

if anyone have an solution to this please let me know

replies.body: So this only started happening when you switched to a hardwired connection? If that's the case, there might be something going on with that cable. Let's try switching back to wifi, and let me know if the problem continues!
